verses.verse: לַמְנַצֵּ֬חַ ׀ <WH5329> To the chief Musician עַֽל־ <WH5921> upon הַגִּתִּ֬ית <WH1665> upon Gittith לְאָסָֽף׃ <WH623> [A Psalm] of Asaph הַ֭רְנִינוּ <WH7442> Sing aloud לֵאלֹהִ֣ים <WH430> unto God עוּזֵּ֑נוּ <WH5797> our strength הָ֝רִ֗יעוּ <WH7321> make a joyful noise לֵאלֹהֵ֥י <WH430> unto the God יַעֲקֹֽב׃ <WH3290> of Jacob

שְֽׂאוּ־ <WH5375> Take זִ֭מְרָה <WH2172> a psalm וּתְנוּ־ <WH5414> and bring תֹ֑ף <WH8596> hither the timbrel כִּנּ֖וֹר <WH3658> harp נָעִ֣ים <WH5273> the pleasant עִם־ <WH5973> with נָֽבֶל׃ <WH5035> with the psaltery
תִּקְע֣וּ <WH8628> Blow up בַחֹ֣דֶשׁ <WH2320> in the new moon שׁוֹפָ֑ר <WH7782> the trumpet בַּ֝כֵּ֗סֶה <WH3677> in the time appointed לְי֣וֹם <WH3117> day חַגֵּֽנוּ׃ <WH2282> on our solemn feast

כִּ֤י <WH3588> is a חֹ֣ק <WH2706> For this [was] a statute לְיִשְׂרָאֵ֣ל <WH3478> for Israel ה֑וּא <WH1931> he מִ֝שְׁפָּ֗ט <WH4941> [and] a law לֵאלֹהֵ֥י <WH430> of the God יַעֲקֹֽב׃ <WH3290> of Jacob

עֵ֤דוּת ׀ <WH5715> [for] a testimony בִּֽיה֘וֹסֵ֤ף <WH3084> in Joseph שָׂמ֗וֹ <WH7760> This he ordained בְּ֭צֵאתוֹ <WH3318> when he went out עַל־ <WH5921> throughout אֶ֣רֶץ <WH776> through the land מִצְרָ֑יִם <WH4714> of Egypt שְׂפַ֖ת <WH8193> a language לֹא־ <WH3808> did not יָדַ֣עְתִּי <WH3045> [that] I understood אֶשְׁמָֽע׃ <WH8085> [where] I heard
הֲסִיר֣וֹתִי <WH5493> I removed מִסֵּ֣בֶל <WH5447> from the burden שִׁכְמ֑וֹ <WH7926> his shoulder כַּ֝פָּ֗יו <WH3709> his hands מִדּ֥וּד <WH1731> from the pots תַּעֲבֹֽרְנָה׃ <WH5674> were delivered

בַּצָּרָ֥ה <WH6869> in trouble קָרָ֗אתָ <WH7121> Thou calledst וָאֲחַ֫לְּצֶ֥ךָּ <WH2502> and I delivered אֶ֭עֶנְךָ <WH6030> thee I answered בְּסֵ֣תֶר <WH5643> thee in the secret place רַ֑עַם <WH7482> of thunder אֶבְחָֽנְךָ֨ <WH974> I proved עַל־ <WH5921> at מֵ֖י <WH4325> thee at the waters מְרִיבָ֣ה <WH4809> of Meribah סֶֽלָה׃ <WH5542> Selah

שְׁמַ֣ע <WH8085> Hear עַ֭מִּי <WH5971> O my people וְאָעִ֣ידָה <WH5749> and I will testify בָּ֑ךְ יִ֝שְׂרָאֵ֗ל <WH3478> unto thee O Israel אִם־ <WH518> if תִּֽשְׁמַֽע־ <WH8085> if thou wilt hearken לִֽי׃

לֹֽא־ <WH3808> Let there be no יִהְיֶ֣ה <WH1961> become בְ֭ךָ אֵ֣ל <WH410> god זָ֑ר <WH2114> There shall no strange וְלֹ֥א <WH3808> Nor תִ֝שְׁתַּחֲוֶ֗ה <WH7812> be in thee neither shalt thou worship לְאֵ֣ל <WH410> god נֵכָֽר׃ <WH5236> any strange

אָנֹכִ֨י ׀ <WH595> I יְה֘וָ֤ה <WH3068> I [am] the LORD אֱלֹהֶ֗יךָ <WH430> thy God הַֽ֭מַּעַלְךָ <WH5927> which brought מֵאֶ֣רֶץ <WH776> thee out of the land מִצְרָ֑יִם <WH4714> of Egypt הַרְחֶב־ <WH7337> wide פִּ֝֗יךָ <WH6310> open thy mouth וַאֲמַלְאֵֽהוּ׃ <WH4390> and I will fill

וְלֹא־ <WH3808> did not שָׁמַ֣ע <WH8085> would not hearken עַמִּ֣י <WH5971> But my people לְקוֹלִ֑י <WH6963> to my voice וְ֝יִשְׂרָאֵ֗ל <WH3478> and Israel לֹא־ <WH3808> did not אָ֥בָה <WH14> would לִֽי׃
וָֽ֭אֲשַׁלְּחֵהוּ <WH7971> So I gave them up בִּשְׁרִיר֣וּת <WH8307> lust לִבָּ֑ם <WH3820> unto their own hearts' יֵ֝לְכ֗וּ <WH1980> to walk בְּֽמוֹעֲצוֹתֵיהֶֽם׃ <WH4156> in their own counsels
ל֗וּ <WH3863> Oh עַ֭מִּי <WH5971> that my people שֹׁמֵ֣עַֽ <WH8085> had hearkened לִ֑י יִ֝שְׂרָאֵ֗ל <WH3478> unto me [and] Israel בִּדְרָכַ֥י <WH1870> in my ways יְהַלֵּֽכוּ׃ <WH1980> had walked

כִּ֭מְעַט <WH4592> I should soon אוֹיְבֵיהֶ֣ם <WH341> their enemies אַכְנִ֑יעַ <WH3665> have subdued וְעַ֥ל <WH5921> against צָ֝רֵיהֶ֗ם <WH6862> against their adversaries אָשִׁ֥יב <WH7725> and turned יָדִֽי׃ <WH3027> my hand

מְשַׂנְאֵ֣י <WH8130> The haters יְ֭הוָה <WH3068> of the LORD יְכַֽחֲשׁוּ־ <WH3584> should have submitted ל֑וֹ וִיהִ֖י <WH1961> to Him עִתָּ֣ם <WH6256> themselves unto him but their time לְעוֹלָֽם׃ <WH5769> should have endured for ever

וַֽ֭יַּאֲכִילֵהוּ <WH398> He should have fed מֵחֵ֣לֶב <WH2459> them also with the finest חִטָּ֑ה <WH2406> of the wheat וּ֝מִצּ֗וּר <WH6697> out of the rock דְּבַ֣שׁ <WH1706> and with honey אַשְׂבִּיעֶֽךָ׃ <WH7646> should I have satisfied
